column2: Color in the areas on these drawings to show where you have pain. Make the marks as big or small as the place where the pain is.
Place a straight, up and down mark on this line to show how much pain you have.
Point to or circle as many of these words that describe your pain
column17: 1= annoying, bad, horrible, miserable, terrible, uncomfortable
column18: 2= aching, hurting, like an ache, like a hurt, sore
column20: 4= biting, cutting, like a pin, like a sharp knife, pin like, sharp, stabbing
column22: 6= cramping, crushing, like a pinch, pinching, pressure
column23: 7= itching, like a scratch, like a sting, scratching, stinging
column30: 14= always, comes and goes, comes on all of a sudden, constant, continuous, forever
column31: 15= off and on, once in a while, sneaks up, sometimes, steady
column32: 16= If you like, you may add other words: ________   ________   ________
